name: AD 1: Dawn of a New Era Quiz | History | 10 Questions

questions.text: Tradition says the present era is dated from the birth of this man in AD 1. Who was this man?
questions.explanation:
Jesus Christ.

	I say 'tradition' because historians and Bible scholars both say that the year of Jesus' birth was actually about 4 BC. Often BC (Before Christ) has been replaced with BCE (Before Common Era) in order to be multicultural.

questions.text: The Christian calendar starts with 1 AD. What does AD mean?
questions.correct: in the year of our Lord
questions.explanation:
in the year of our Lord.

	AD is the abbreviation for the Latin phrase 'Anno Domini' and means 'in the year of our Lord'. In place of AD the letters CE (Common Era) are often used.

questions.text: What was the approximate population of the world in AD 1?
questions.explanation:
250 million.

	In 2011 the world population was estimated to be approximately 7 billion.

questions.text: What Mayan city was founded in AD 1?
questions.explanation:
La Milpa.

	La Milpa was located in Belize on the border of Mexico and Guatemala. It was the third largest Mayan site in Belize. La Milpa had great agriculture and was a centralized power. (Information from HistoryMole.com and wikipedia.com)

questions.text: What was dug out of a dry hillside in Nazca, Peru, in AD 1?
questions.explanation:
the Owl Man.

	One arm was pointed to the sky, the other arm was pointed to the earth.

questions.text: Where did the settlers from Polynesia begin to settle in AD 1?
questions.explanation:
Madagascar.

	Information found on historymole.com It is believed that the Polynesians who settled in Madagascar called themselves "vawaka" meaning "canoe people". (wikipedia.com)

questions.text: Who was emperor of the Roman Empire in AD 1?
questions.explanation:
Augustus Caesar.

	Augustus Caesar was in his 42nd year of his 56 year reign.  http://omacl.org/Anglo/part1.html

questions.text: In AD 1 all of the following except one of the choices below were Aran Islands with forts built on them. Which one is NOT one of the Aran islands?
questions.explanation:
Ivanhoe.

	The Aran Islands are found on the mouth of the Galway Bay. The Galway Bay is found on the western coast of Ireland.

questions.text: Who was the calendar maker who designated AD 1 as the year of the first Christmas?
questions.explanation:
Dionysus Exiguus.

	He was also known as Dennis the Small. Exiguus was around from AD 470-544. However, he is included as he marked something back in history to year one. That is of course the recognition of the first Christmas.

questions.text: Paintings were made by unknown Indians, in AD 1, on rock surfaces on mountain ranges located where?
questions.explanation:
Baha Peninsula.

	The Baha Peninsula is located near La Paz.
